mapper.sql: select id, area_id, name, code, width, bear_weight,height,type_code, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, status, remark from md_frame
mapper.select: select f.id as id,w.id as ware_id ,w.code as ware_code,w.name as ware_name, a.id as area_id, a.name as area_name,a.code as area_code,f.code as code,f.height as height,f.type_code as type_code, f.name as name,f.width as width,f.bear_weight as bear_weight,f.create_time as create_time from md_frame f left join md_area a on f.area_id=a.id left join md_ware w on w.id=a.ware_id where f.id = #{id}

select f.id as id,w.id as ware_id ,w.code as ware_code,w.name as ware_name, a.id as area_id, a.name as area_name,a.code as area_code,f.code as code,f.height as height,f.type_code as type_code, f.name as name,f.width as width,f.bear_weight as bear_weight,f.create_time as create_time from md_frame f left join md_area a on f.area_id=a.id left join md_ware w on w.id=a.ware_id where f.code = #{code}
mapper.insert:
insert into md_frame
area_id, name, code, width, bear_weight, height, type_code, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, status, remark,
#{areaId}, #{name}, #{code}, #{width}, #{bearWeight}, #{height}, #{typeCode}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{remark},

insert.foreach:
insert into md_frame
area_id, name, code, width, bear_weight, height, type_code, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, status, remark,
values ( #{item.areaId}, #{item.name}, #{item.code}, #{item.width}, #{item.bearWeight}, #{item.height}, #{item.typeCode}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.status}, #{item.remark}, ) on DUPLICATE key update
area_id =values(area_id), name = values(name), code = values(code), width = values(width), height = values(height), type_code = values(type_code), bear_weight = values(bear_weight), create_by = values(create_by), update_by = values(update_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), status = values(status), remark = values(remark),

mapper.delete:
delete from md_frame where id in
#{id}
